meanings.definition: The act of proposing something for consideration or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: Her reposals for the school fundraiser were met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The reposals for the new project were carefully reviewed by the team.
meanings.sent3: His reposals for a pizza party every day were not taken seriously.
meanings.sent4: The reposals for a complete office redesign shook things up.
meanings.sent5: The reposals for a company-wide picnic sparked excitement among employees.

meanings.definition: The act of offering something for sale.
meanings.sent1: The reposals of the antique vase attracted many buyers.
meanings.sent2: Online reposals of handmade crafts have become popular.
meanings.sent3: His reposals of selling snow in summer made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reposals of discounted items flew off the shelves.
meanings.sent5: Her reposals of vintage clothing drew in a crowd at the market.

meanings.definition: The act of placing something in a new position or location.
meanings.sent1: The reposals of the furniture transformed the living room.
meanings.sent2: Careful reposals of the books on the shelf made them more accessible.
meanings.sent3: His reposals of moving the fridge to the bedroom puzzled his roommates.
meanings.sent4: The reposals of relocating the office to a bigger space were successful.
meanings.sent5: Her reposals of rearranging the garden added a fresh look to the backyard.
